register_message:
Hello,

Your Open Game Panel account has been created and you may now login using the following account information:

Username: %s
Password: %s

Remember to change your password often and the first time you login.

Please do not reply to this email!

______________________________
OGP Mailer
err_confirm_password: Verify password field cannot be empty
err_login_name: User name is empty or in use.
err_users_parent: Sub-user accounts may not create other users.
err_parent_user: The parent user ID must reference a valid pre-existing user.
err_email_address_already_in_use_by: Email address already in use by %s.
your_account_details_has_been_sent_by_em: Your account details has been sent by email to %s.
subject: Hello %s, welcome to %s!
listdel_sub_user: List, Modify Sub User Account Information, or Delete Sub User
del_subuser_conf: Are you sure you want to delete this account:
no_subusers: No subusers have been created under your account yet!
subuser_deleted: Sub-User %s was successfully deleted from the database!
subuser_added: Sub-User %s was successfully created and added to the database!
